translations: vt.剥夺……的公民权（等于 disfranchise）

phrs.translation: 使失去投票权, 剥夺公民权, 褫夺公权

sentences.sentence: White supremacists devise new methods to disenfranchise Negroes.
sentences.translation: 白人至上论者想出新的方法以剥夺黑人的公民权。

sentences.sentence: White supremacists devise new Methods: To disenfranchise Negroes.
sentences.translation: 白人至上论者想出新的方法以剥夺黑人的公民权。

sentences.sentence: But this would disenfranchise lawyers and doctors who work long hours or poor people who work two jobs.
sentences.translation: 但是，这将剥夺律师和医生谁长时间工作或工作穷人谁两个职位。
